title: The Silent Tax: Fiat's Hidden Cost
content: Since 1971, when Nixon severed the dollar from gold, your purchasing power has been silently stolen. Every dollar you save loses value through inflation—government's hidden tax that hits working families hardest. Remember when a house cost $25,000? A college education was affordable? That was before the money printer ran wild. Now, your grandparents' retirement savings buy less than half of what they once did. This isn't economics—it's generational theft.

title: A Generation's Inheritance: Debt, Division, Decay
content: Fertility rates collapsed. Divorce rates soared. Mental health plummeted. After 1971, antidepressant use exploded alongside obesity and suicide rates. Housing became unaffordable. Young people remain trapped at home into their 30s. Wealth inequality reached record highs while wage growth stagnated. This wasn't accidental—it was the cost of fiat's Triffin Dilemma, where global power demands domestic sacrifice. We inherited this broken system, but we don't have to perpetuate it.

title: Bitcoin: The Peaceful Exit
content: Bitcoin isn't hedging the system. It's replacing it. With a fixed supply of 21 million coins, no government can print away your wealth. No central bank can manipulate rates to benefit the elite. Bitcoin is ethical money—decentralized, censorship-resistant, mathematically sound. It's the tool of peaceful resistance that empowers individuals to defend their property without violence or permission. Choose self-custody. Choose sovereignty. Fix the money, fix the world.

title: The Choice: Fiat vs. Bitcoin
content:
Control: Fiat is centralized by governments, prone to manipulation. Bitcoin is decentralized, peer-to-peer.

Supply: Fiat's infinite printing causes inflation. Bitcoin's fixed at 21 million—scarce like gold, but digital and divisible.

Prosperity: Fiat concentrates wealth among elites. Bitcoin rewards proof of work, enabling global access and economic mobility.

This isn't left or right—it's about fixing the incentives at the core.
